org.example

Class DVDFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.DVDFileIO

  • public class DVDFileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the DVD reading and writing operations.

      java.lang.String fileString()
      This method reconstructs the DVD object, so they can be written to file.

      This method creates a DVD object from a line in the text file.

      This method reads a text file with DVD information inside.
      java.time.LocalDate todaysDate()

      This method writes a text file with DVD information in string format.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public void readFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads a text file with DVD information inside.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the reader can't read the file

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile()
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method writes a text file with DVD information in string format.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the writer can't write to file

      • fileString

        public java.lang.String fileString()
        This method reconstructs the DVD object, so they can be written to file.
        Returns:
        a string containing all the DVDs separated by comma

      • getDVDObject

        public DVD getDVDObject(java.lang.String[] arr)
        This method creates a DVD object from a line in the text file.
        Parameters:
        arr - DVD information in array format
        Returns:
        a DVD object
